subtitle: welcome to meaningful Monday's where we
answer your personal questions the
question this week is about dreams I
dream a lot how can i distinguish an
important message from something
insignificant in my dreams well a dream
is a paradox on one hand every dream has
nonsense in it on the other hand the
dream can also include foresight and
insight into our life's experiences
however the challenges how do you
distinguish between the two some once
approached the mystic and ask them to
interpret his dreams and the mystic
humorously said first let's figure out
how to live our lives when we're awake
before we get to our dreams the bottom
line is to be a responsible human being
and often it's important to just avoid
or ignore a dream and to figure out how
to live consciously on a daily basis in
a responsible way and deal with the
challenges directly instead of relying
on some exotic or mysterious element
that dreams offer us obviously there are
times where a dream especially if it's
repeated can be sending us a message but
generally speaking is best to ignore
these messages because we can become
consumed and obsessed with our dreams
and it completely disturbs the
equilibrium of living a responsible life
this has been meaningful Mondays thank
you for watching you can submit your
questions by clicking on the link below
everyone have a meaningful week
